title: Отъехавшие
overview: A documentary project about comedians who left for Georgia after the war began. In the frame: Ariana Lolaeva, Ilya Ovechkin, Idrak Mirzalizade, Konstantin Shirokov, Ruslan Khalitov and many others.In each episode, the comedians talk to people, travel around Georgia and simply try to understand how to live on. Lively and free humor in this show coexists with serious reflection on the topic of war and its consequences.
